document.full_text: the mets dropped a doubleheader in atlanta and placed chris young, one of their best pitchers this season, on the disabled list.
document.title: braves 4, mets 0; braves 4, mets 2: stay in atlanta costs mets two games and a pitcher
lines_and_colors: the mets dropped a doubleheader in atlanta and placed chris young, one of their best pitchers this season, on the disabled list.
